wo wo wow reloaded release a steam update that is only 18.81mb :o_O, i was hoping it to be 1 -1.5 gb. Great Work Reloaded maybe.
this update fixes a bug where the game would default to low hz each time you start it
Yeah I though the game was laggy until I realized it was at 23hz. Put it back at 60hz it's much better but it's still jerking a bit.
Utorrent says this contains files that may harm my computer... I've never seen that before so it has to mean somehting bad.

utorrent play smart with executables but it's not even scanning virus or something. ignore it.
